short_description: pizzaria luzzo is a pizza & italian restaurant based in tavira, portugal.
long_description: um espaço moderno e arrojado, de ambiente descontraído e cosmopolita, perfeito para desfrutar de uma experiência gastronómica de excelência. as nossas pizzas de elevada qualidade confecionadas em forno de lenha seguem a base da pizza italiana com opções de de massa fina e crocante, ou massa napolitana, combinadas aos ingredientes e sabores portugueses com o melhor dos nossos produtos nacionais. para além das estrelas da casa, oferecemos opções de entradas, saladas, sobremesas e cocktails igualmente bem elaborados. eat, drink, enjoy. é esta a nossa essência.
generated_description: pizzaria luzzo is a pizza restaurant located in tavira, portugal. it offers a variety of services including pizza delivery, pizza takeout, and dine-in options. the establishment serves a range of beverages such as beer, cocktails, coffee, and wine, and provides a menu that includes vegetarian options, small plates, lunch, dinner, and dessert. the restaurant is equipped with facilities such as wheelchair accessibility, restrooms, and wi-fi. it also accepts various payment methods including credit and debit cards, as well as mobile nfc payments. the venue is suitable for groups and families, and offers high chairs for children. parking is available on-site and in the surrounding streets.
